# logtail_warehouse_embedding (Data Source)

This data source allows you to retrieve information about a Warehouse embedding. For more information about the Warehouse Embeddings API check https://betterstack.com/docs/warehouse/api/embeddings/



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (String) The ID of the embedding to retrieve.
- `source_id` (String) The ID of the warehouse source to filter embeddings by.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) The time when this embedding was created.
- `dimension` (Number) The vector dimension of the embeddings to generate.
- `embed_from` (String) The source column name containing the text to embed.
- `embed_to` (String) The target column name where the generated embeddings will be stored.
- `model` (String) The name of the embedding model to use.
- `updated_at` (String) The time when this embedding was last updated.
